programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: Wake
programme.desc: When things get tough for offbeat Carys Reitman, she does what any emotionally isolated, modern girl would do - she goes to strangers funerals. At one fateful funeral, she unexpectedly meets Tyler, a man mourning his fiancee. Despite the warnings of her undertaker best friend Shane and her roommate Lila, she finds herself connecting to someone for the first time. Searching for answers, Carys goes to see her estranged mother to confront her past. And as she tries to open herself to the risks of love with Tyler, she realizes she may have more to fear than just a broken heart.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Donald P. Sinclair has placed six separate gold coins in different slot machines in his casino. The lucky six who find these coins discover an opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to own $2 million. Locked up in a locker in New Mexico, these six contestants must now race each other, to be the first to the cash. There are no rules in place and everything that could possibly happen, does. Whilst, behind the scenes, Sinclairs associates are placing their bets.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: In the near future our government will decide who is expendable.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: Deserter
programme.desc: Unlikely friends in a melting pot of confusion. Simon Murray fights for the French Foreign Legion. Pascal Dupont fights for himself. War torn men question honour, hope, morality...because you can desert everything...except yourself.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: A fisherman discovers an abandoned sailboat and decides to board. He finds no signs of life, but when he gets back on deck his own boat appears to have disappeared. What follows is an absolute nightmare.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: Gals klāt!
programme.desc: Bohēmisku ballīti aktiera Džeimsa Franko mājās pārtrauc neizprotamas un graujošas dabas parādības. Vairums viesu namu pamet, bet paliek daži viņa draugi, tai skaitā arī Sets Rogens un Džona Hils. Pārtikas un dzeramā nav daudz, iziet uz ielas ir pārāk bīstami, taču "zālītes" un citu narkotisko vielu viņiem ir pārpārēm. Aktieri vada dienas gan izklaidējoties, gan apsverot nākotnes filmu scenārijus un strīdoties, bet pienāk brīdis, kad nopietna iemesla dēļ puiši ir spiesti bēgt no mājas, lai meklētu glābiņu un atklātu atbildi uz jautājumu - kas ir tas, kas viņus apdraud?

programme.title: Mūzika un vārdi
programme.desc: Apjukušam dziedātājam dotas pāris dienas, lai sacerētu hitu, kas iekaros topu un kļūs par pusaudžu sensāciju. Lai gan viņš nekad mūžā nav sarakstījis pienācīgu dziesmu tekstu, viņā uzplaiksnī dzirksts ar neparastu jaunāku sievieti ar izcilu vārdu mākslu.

programme.desc: Saulains velobrauciens cauri Lahemā.

programme.title: Blakusparādības
programme.desc: Pastāv uzskats, ka cilvēki spēj izmantot tikai 20 procentus savu smadzeņu. Vai varat iedomāties, kas notiktu, ja jūs spētu tās izmantot pilnībā? Pietiek ar vienu tableti, lai sasniegtu pilnību. Ko jūs darītu? Tiektos pēc slavas, varas? Cik tālu jūs būtu gatavi iet?

programme.title: Gredzenu pavēlnieks: Gredzena brālība
programme.desc: Lēnprātīgs hobits no Šīras un astoņi biedri dodas ceļojumā, lai iznīcinātu vareno Gredzenu un glābtu Viduszemi no Tumšā Kunga Saurona.

programme.title: Aizbēgt trīs dienās
programme.desc: Džona dzīve šķiet ideāla līdz brīdim, kad viņa sieva Lara tiek apcietināta par slepkavību, kuru viņa nav pastrādājusi. Visi izmisīgie centieni sievu atbrīvot ar tiesas palīdzību ir nesekmīgi. Džons nolemj izstrādāt bīstamu un pārdrošu plānu, lai kopā ar savu sievu aizbēgtu no cietuma...

programme.title: Gredzenu pavēlnieks. Divi torņi
programme.desc: Kamēr Frodo un Sems ar viltīgā Golluma palīdzību tuvojas Mordorai, sašķeltā biedrība nostājas pret Saurona jauno sabiedroto Sarumanu un viņa Izengardas ordām.

programme.desc: Kals Vīvers ir veiksminieks - viņam ir lielisks darbs, sapņu māja, jauki bērni un mīļotā sieva, ar kuru viņš iepazinās jau vidusskolā. Tomēr, kad Kals uzzina, ka sieva viņu krāpj un pieprasa šķiršanos, viņa ideālā dzīve mainās līdz nepazīšanai.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat
programme.desc: Bobby Flays best friend, Iron Chef Michael Symon, enters the Triple Threat kitchen. But friendship doesnt stop Bobby from making this a fair fight!

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm

This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat
programme.desc: Chef Shota Nakajima, a master of Japanese cuisine, brings his Michelin training and pristine technique to combat his mentors, Bobby Flays Titans.

programme.title: Cupcake Championship
programme.desc: Four cupcake connoisseurs battle it out in this cooking competition series, hoping to prove they are the supreme cupcake bakers and take home the $10,000 prize. Each of these contestants are undoubtedly talented cupcake designers, but there can only be one winner, and the heat is on to showcase their artistry and flair when it comes to baking these little sweet treats. Hosted by Kardea Brown, the show give the bakers new challenges to complete in each episode, with the poorest performing contestant eliminated at each stage of the competition, resulting in a final showdown between the very best.

programme.title: Last Bite Hotel
programme.desc: Tituss Burgess asks the remaining chefs to create a noodle dish for Iron Chef Michael Symon. The bottom two chefs face off in a sudden-death round.

programme.title: Buddy Vs. Duff
programme.desc: Two of Americas most prominent baking connoisseurs whisk, beat and whip against each other to become the champion of cake. Buddy Valastro, the Italian star of Cake Boss and Duff Goldman, the professional pastry star of Ace of Cakes, compete in a baking battle like no other, using their experience, knowledge and culinary skill-set to produce magnificent cakes. Whether its a masterpiece fit for a wedding, a birthday cake fit for a celebrity, donuts to please eager customers at a Los Angeles drive-thru or sweet treats to satisfy amusement park thrill-seekers, the competitive chefs pull out all the stops to win each challenge.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Outrageous Pumpkins
programme.desc: Pumpkin carving is one of the most fun activities during autumn season. But these individuals take it to the next level, creating real works of art out of their pumpkins. Watch them compete in a series of fun challenges for a great cash prize. They transform the pumpkins into various spooky things, from monsters to zombies and more.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Cake Boss

Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Shift 2: Adaptability. Cooking game.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Fatigue sets in as the chefs face hours seven and eight while turning one bag of ingredients into three distinct meals for judge Scott Conant.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Nolīdzināt līdz ar zemi
programme.desc: Divi policisti tiek atbrīvoti no darba pēc tam, kad atklātībā nonāk video, kurā abi pārinieki pielieto spēku, lai saņemtu atzīšanos no aizdomās turamā. Nespēdami atrast citu nodarbošanos, viņi dodas peļņā kriminālajā sfērā, kur par viņu galveno ienaidnieku kļūst nesen no cietuma iznākušais un atriebību policijai alkstošs noziedznieks.

programme.title: Karstais pārītis: apbruņotas un apburošas
programme.desc: FIB aģente Sāra Ešbērna ir ārkārtīgi ambicioza, iedomīga un godkārīga būtne, kura nesatiek ar saviem kolēģiem. Viņu nosūta uz Bostonu noskaidrot izveicīgā narkotirgoņa Lārkina kunga identitāti. Bostonā Ešbērnai jāstrādā kopā ar noteikumu pārkāpēju Malinsu, taču sadarboties būs grūti, jo Ešbērna visu dara pēc priekšrakstiem, savukārt Malinsa rīkojas pēc sava prāta. Vai atšķirīgās kolēģes spēs notvert nelieti un procesa laikā kļūt par draudzenēm?

programme.title: Killera sievas miesassargs
programme.desc: Miesassargs Maikls Braiss beidzot var atviegloti uzelpot. Trakais killers Dariuss Kinkeids, kurš piebeidzis veselu baru ļaužu visā pasaulē, nu ir nozudis. Saule, mīļākā grāmata un ne domas par Kinkeidu – ko gan vēl varētu vēlēties, lai atgūtu formu. Taču tad pludmalē uzrodas līdz matu galiem apbruņotā Kinkeida sieva Sonja, un viņai ir sliktas ziņas – Kinkeids ir Itālijā, viņu nolaupījuši teroristi un tie ir jāiznīcina!

programme.title: Spoku mednieki
programme.desc: Astoņdesmito gadu kulta filma atgūst otro elpu pēc 30 gadiem! Reiz spoku mednieki izglāba Ņujorku no spoku uzbrukuma, taču, kad pilsētai atkal draud briesmas, pagātnes varoņi vairs nav spējīgi stāties aizsardzībā. Laiks viņu vietu ieņemt citiem brašuļiem... vai tomēr brašulēm? Spoku mednieku jaunais četrinieks ir gatavs upurēt sevi, aizsargājot dzimto megapoli no visādiem mošķiem!

programme.title: Lils, Lils, Krokodils!
programme.desc: Pēc pārcelšanās uz Ņujorku Primmu ģimene atklāj, ka viņu jaunās mājas bēniņos dzīvo Lils, dziedošs sālsūdens krokodils, kuram garšo kaviārs, patīk iet vannā un klausīties mūziku. Ar Lilu ātri sadraudzējas Primmu dēlēns Džošs, bet, kad krokodila eksistenci apdraud ļaunais kaimiņš, Primmiem jāapvienojas ar Lila harismātisko īpašnieku Hektoru Valenti, lai parādītu pasaulei, ka tajā ir vieta arī lielam, dziedošam krokodilam ar vēl lielāku personību.

programme.title: Pēdējais elpas vilciens
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par dziļjūras nirējiem, kas cīnās, lai izglābtu savu komandas biedru, iesprostotu desmitiem metru zem okeāna virsmas.

programme.title: Dzīve
programme.desc: Šī ir filma par kādu parastu vīrieti, kuru gadiem ilgi nomākusī biroja rutīna novedusi līdz eksistencei ēnā. Tā dēļ viņš pēdējā brīdī pieliek vislielākās pūles, lai pārvērstu savu garlaicīgo dzīvi par kaut ko brīnišķīgu.

programme.title: Amerikas maģisko melnādaino biedrība
programme.desc: Jauns vīrietis tiek uzņemts noslēpumainā biedrībā, kurā darbojas maģiski melnādainie cilvēki, kas veltī savu dzīvi augstākā mērķa īstenošanai: atvieglot baltajiem cilvēkiem dzīvi.

programme.title: Vīrs, vārdā Oto
programme.desc: Stāsts par nīgru atraitni, vārdā Oto Andersons, kura vienīgais prieciņš ir ķīvēšanās ar izmisušajiem kaimiņiem un viņu kritizēšana. Kad viņam blakus durvīs ievācas kāda jauna ģimene, asprātīgajā grūtniecē Marisolā viņš sastopas ar līdzvērtīgu pretinieku. Šī satikšanās izvēršas par negaidītu draudzību, kas apvērsīs Oto pasauli kājām gaisā.

programme.title: Čārlija eņģeļi
programme.desc: Noslēpumainā Čārlza Taunsenda detektīvaģentūra atvērusi birojus visā pasaulē. Tās paspārnē vairāku Bosliju vadībā izveidotas Eņģeļu komandas, kurās darbojas visgudrākās, visdrosmīgākās un visaugstāk kvalificētās sievietes, kam jātiek galā ar vissarežģītākajiem uzdevumiem jebkur uz zemeslodes.

programme.title: Tusnīte
programme.desc: Trīs draudzeņu vidū Bjanka ir visatšķirīgākā – gandrīz neredzama. Pasniedzēji neatceras viņas vārdu, un skolasbiedri – nesveicina. Bjankai pašai liekas, ka viss ir kārtībā, bet bērnības draugs skolas smukulītis Vess atklāj, kāds ir meitenes patiesais statuss nežēlīgajā skolas hierarhijā. Pateicoties puisim, Bjanka nolemj mainīt dzīvi. Taču meitenes apņemšanos apdraud skolas skaistule Medisona, kuras nākotnes plānos ietilpst dalība kādā realitātes šovā, tāpēc jau laikus viņa iejūtas lomā, katru savas ikdienas soli dokumentējot ar mobilo telefonu un sociālajos tīklos audzējot "biezu ādu". Viņasprāt, tikai nejauks cilvēks var sasniegt panākumus.

programme.title: Pasaules ieņemšana. Cīņa par Losandželosu
programme.desc: Zemi pārsteidz nezināma ienaidnieka uzbrukums – krīt nepārtraukts milzīgu meteorītu lietus, savā ceļā izpostot visu. Ātri vien kļūst skaidrs, ka pasauli cenšas iekarot citplanētieši. Tiem pretī nekavējoties stājas armija, taču spēki nešķiet samērīgi. Jūras kājinieku seržants Nants jau gatavojās atvaļināties, taču nu tiek nozīmēts uz jaunzveidoto kaujas vienību. Šīs vienības uzdevums ir glābt civiliedzīvotājus, kas ieslodzīti policijas iecirknī citplanētiešu iekarotajā teritorijā. Ir tikai trīs stundas laika, lai paveiktu misiju, jo tad Gaisa spēkiem tiks dota komanda bombardēt šo teritoriju.

programme.title: After. Pēc kritiena
programme.desc: Tesa ir gatava jaunam dzīves posmam. Spožais prestižas koledžas diploms paver jaunas iespējas – meitene atrod sapņu darbu starptautiskā kompānijā. Viņas nodoms pārcelties uz Sietlu nemaz neiepriecina Hārdinu. Viņa neapmierinātība, pārmetumi un mūžīgā greizsirdība sāpīgi ievaino Tesu un rada bažas. Vai ir vērts visu likt uz kārts un upurēt daudzsološu karjeru? Taču kā lai aizmirst kopā pavadītās naktis un kaislīgos skūpstus, viņa ciešos vīrieša apskāvienus un tuvību, kas padara traku?

programme.title: "Back to Black"
programme.desc: Filma "Back to Black" ir stāsts par 21.gs. zvaigzni Eimiju Vainhausu no pusaudzes gadiem līdz pasaulslavenā albuma "Back to Black" tapšanai, atklājot neatkārtojamo radošo dzirksti, asprātību un atklātību, kā arī cenšoties izprast viņas dēmonus. Albums "Back To Black" ieguva 5 Grammy balvas, un ir viens no visvairāk pārdotajiem albumiem. Tajā ir Eimijas sirdspuksti, skaļāki ar katru sirdssāpi, katra dziesma ir viņas un Bleika mīlas stāsts.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Mīluļu slepenā dzīve
programme.desc: Makss (Luiss Sīkejs) ir enerģisks un sajūsmināts Džeka Rasela terjers, kurš dzīvo Manhetenas dzīvoklī kopā ar īpašnieci Keitiju (Elija Kempere). Taču viņa laimīgā dzīve pārtrūkst, kad saimniece pieņem jaunu suni Grāfu (Ēriks Stounstrīts). Makss apņemas atgūt saimnieces uzmanību tikai sev un mēģina Grāfu atstāt kādā sānielā, taču viņus ielenc kaķu banda, kuru vada Ozons (Stīvs Kūgans). Viņi tik tikko izglābj savas dzīvības, kad nākas saskarties ar pamesto dzīvnieku armijas niknumu apburošā, bet psihiski nelīdzsvarotā truša Sniegapikas (Kevins Hārts) vadībā. Šis ir Ņujorkas piedzīvojums, kurš liek Maksam un Grāfam izvērtēt savu sacensību un mēģināt izjaukt Sniegapikas atriebes plānu pret visiem dzīvnieku īpašniekiem Ņujorkā.

programme.title: Džumandži: Laipni lūgti džungļos
programme.desc: Četri vidusskolēni atrod vecu spēļu konsoli ar līdz šim neredzētu videospēli džumandži. Viņi iesaistās šajā spēlē, kas norisinās džungļos, un iemiesojas pašu izraudzītajos avataros. Jaunieši apjauš, ka džumandži ir kas vairāk par spēli, tā ir cīņa par izdzīvošanu. Lai uzvarētu spēlē, viņiem jādodas bīstamākajā piedzīvojumā mūžā, jāatklāj Alana Periša pirms 20 gadiem atstātās pēdas un jāmaina priekšstats pašiem par sevi, pretējā gadījumā viņi paliks ieslēgti spēlē uz visiem laikiem...

programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: Naudas cena: Largo Vinča piedzīvojums
programme.desc: Largo Vinčs izmisīgi meklē savu nolaupīto dēlu, saprotot, ka pēdas pie tiem, kas izraisījuši viņa bankrotu, varētu aizvest arī pie Largo dēla.

programme.title: Lepnā princese
programme.desc: Jaunajam un izskatīgajam karalim Bendžaminam ir pienācis laiks precēties. Viņu savaldzina princeses Karolīnas portrets. Kad princese viņu atraida, karalis, pārģērbies par dārznieku, iekļūst Karolīnas pilī un iekaro viņas sirdi.

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: After. Pēc mūsu tikšanās
programme.desc: Pēc Annas Todas grāmatas veidotā filma atklāj jaunas sievietes aizraušanos ar sava kaisles objekta tumšo pusi, cerot uz īstu mīlestību.

programme.title: Gultā ar slepkavu
programme.desc: Nelabais ir detaļās… Nekas nav tā, kā izskatās, kad vienas nakts sakars pārtop sērijveida slepkavas nežēlīgā slepkavību virknē.

programme.title: Īlaijas grāmata
programme.desc: Pa postapokaliptisko zemi, kas reiz bija Amerika, ceļo kāds vīrs. Caur tukšām pilsētām, izpostītām autostrādēm - pa zemi, kas pārvērtusies pelnos. Šeit nav civilizācijas un nekādu likumu. Ceļi pieder bandām, kas nogalinās cilvēku par pāri kurpju vai malku ūdens. Taču sacensties ar vientuļnieku nav pa spēkam nevienam - Īlaija pieveiks ikvienu, kas to izaicinās. Tomēr viņš necīnās par savu labklājību, viņam ir misija, ko viņš apņēmies veikt līdz galam.

programme.title: Zombijzemē: Otrais šāviens
programme.desc: Nesaudzīgā un bezbailīgā zombiju mednieku četrotne dodas uz Amerikas vidieni, par savu jauno mājvietu atrodot Balto namu. Tur viņi stāsies pretī ne tikai jauna veida dzīvajiem miroņiem, bet arī citiem izdzīvojušajiem, kas nebūt nav draudzīgi noskaņoti. Turklāt viņu pašu vidū rodas nopietnas domstarpības.

programme.title: Naktsmītne
programme.desc: Topošā sieva ar diviem sava līgavaiņa bērniem apmetusies brīvdienu namā kādā attālā ciematā. Attiecībām atsalstot, sāk risināties dīvaini un biedējoši notikumi.

programme.title: Hokejs: Šveices Nacionālā līga. Lugano - Davos
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.title: NHL. Los Angeles Kings - Winnipeg Jets
programme.desc: All the action and stories of the elimination tournament in the National Hockey League consisting of four rounds of best-of-seven series. Who will be the league champion and the winner of the Stanley Cup?

programme.title: Basketbols: BCL. VEF Riga - Patrioti Levice
programme.desc: Basketball live game.

programme.title: Basketbols: BCL. Hapoel Holon - Joventut
programme.desc: Basketball live game.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Fenerbahce - FC Bayern
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Maccabi - Olympiacos
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: LaLiga. Villarreal - Real Betis
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Cheap Old Houses
programme.desc: Cheap Old Houses is inspired by Ethan and Elizabeth Finkelsteins uber popular Instagram feed by the same name, which racks up millions of views with images of surprising property bargains that are architecturally intact and available for under $150,000. In each episode, cameras will follow the couple as they tour low-priced older houses across America and ultimately choose which ones to feature on their famous site.

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.desc: Just as Dave and Jenny learn to adopt traditional Italian building methods, progress halts when they discover construction shuts down in the summer.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous: Italiano

programme.title: No Demo Reno

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Jenn helps a couple renovate their house in a casual and traditional style, but Jenn and Victor clash over some porcelain countertops.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The kids want to finish their bedrooms, but Chase needs to rally to get basement walls demoed and a new floor poured on time for a future family room.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The Morrill family take on an ambitious kitchen overhaul. Chase discovers local stoneworkers and embraces the artistic side of the kids.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Happy to be Home with the Benkos
programme.desc: An artist who recently purchased an 1861 house in Summerville, SC asks the Benkos to add colour and joy to turn it into a home.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: American reality television series. Married couple Chip and Johanna Gaines own a home renovation and redecoration service in Waco, Texas, and had worked on over 100 homes before the show. They begin with showing a hopeful couple three potential homes to purchase in central Texas, all of which require a significant amount of repair or renovation. Once the couple have chosen the home they like, Johanna designs the renovations and Chip is the lead contractor. Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Jenn revamps a familys dated home to create more functional storage space in their craft room. Later, she designs a flex space in a family dining room.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Home renovation expert Jennifer Todryk combines clever design and cost-saving ideas to create stunning home overhauls without any major demolition.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: Jonathan and Drew take on a couple with two daughters and more than 10 pets. Plus, a family looks for a smart investment with cowboy charm.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Joanna collaborates with a design employee to create a magical playroom full of surprises and multifunctional spaces for her three kids.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: Joanna works within a small budget and even smaller rooms to create a moody yet charming palette for practical spaces like a mudroom and art studio.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Cheap Old Houses
programme.desc: Cheap Old Houses is inspired by Ethan and Elizabeth Finkelsteins uber popular Instagram feed by the same name, which racks up millions of views with images of surprising property bargains that are architecturally intact and available for under $150,000. In each episode, cameras will follow the couple as they tour low-priced older houses across America and ultimately choose which ones to feature on their famous site.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: Captivating docu-reality series in which Rebecca Budig shows viewers some of the worlds most amazing, luxurious and extraordinary water featured homes. You will have a chance to see what happens when you combine creativity, ingenuity and lots and lots of water when she takes us on a tour of cool properties such as a private water parks, islands and lakes, luxury houseboats and yachts with every amenity imaginable including a private crew.

programme.title: House Hunters: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: A family is ready to give up surfside California for the Colorado River in Arizona. They love boats, jet skis and want plenty of space for their toys.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Join host Tony Harris as he investigates the most mysterious content ever captured and attempts to unearth the truth. Employing the assistance of experts and state-of-the-art technology, Tony is determined to decipher whether these photos, videos and audio recordings of purported supernatural and paranormal events are falsified or for real. He meets with eyewitnesses, conducts tests and stops at nothing to determine the truth.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: American Pickers is an American reality series that follows ingenious "pickers" Mike Wolfe, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value. They travel around the United States to buy or "pick" various items for resale, for clients, or for their own personal collections. Danielle Colby is in charge of their office of Antique Archaeology.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In different parts of the world there are eyewitnesses who claim they saw various mythical, strange and even scary creatures, from vampires and ghosts to different types of monsters. These individuals tell their stories while a team of experts and scientists use any available evidence to try to find explanations for these unusual sightings.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In different parts of the world there are eyewitnesses who claim they saw various mythical, strange and even scary creatures, from vampires and ghosts to different types of monsters. These individuals tell their stories while a team of experts and scientists use any available evidence to try to find explanations for these unusual sightings.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Mankind Decoded
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The most venomous creature of the sea is on the move and spreading across the oceans leaving a trail of poisoned victims. These monsters, known to kill within three minutes, have been part of the ecosystem for more than 500 million years.

programme.title: Breaking Mysterious
programme.desc: Join host Jimmy Church and his team of truth-seeking investigators as they examine some of the biggest mysteries, extraordinary phenomena and unconventional conspiracy theories in America. Episodes include investigating a plot to assassinate President John F. Kennedy just weeks before his actual, tragic assassination in Dallas with vital new information being obtained from one of the Presidents secret servicemen; debating the possibility that a popular virtual smartphone game could actually be part of a CIA mind control operation; or tracking the events when a nuclear weapon goes missing off the coast of Georgias Tybee Island. Follow the team as they seek disclosure, answers and the truth in this adventurous series.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Reality series following the adventures of Egyptologist Dr Zahi Hawass and his team as they search for the secrets of ancient Egypt. Travelling across this fascinating country, Dr Zahi Hawass and his crew embark on a historical and archaeological expedition – and try to preserve important artefacts.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Host Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost and stolen history, including Hitlers personal photo albums and James Bonds original Aston Martin. Plus, an FBI sting operation seeks a Civil War relic stained with human blood.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Deep Sea Treasure Hunter
programme.desc: Have a look at the history series and its four episodes telling us how Ross Kemp, presenter and journalist, is making his life-long dream come true. He dives down on shipwrecks to uncover hidden stories and recover true treasures and mysterious stories hidden behind. Neil Brock is his personal guide and dive supervisor providing him a special intensive training course. Expert divers Emily Turton and Mallory Haas accompany Ross along his exploration around various parts of the UK.
