programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad stirnai Podziņai jāšķērso Celtnieklīča lidostas skrejceļš, Rabls un komanda zina, kas jābūvē. Rabls un komanda uzbūvē milzu skrituļdēli tantes Celtnes un Rivera šovam. Taču, kad tas zaudē kontroli, suņiem jādzenas pakaļ!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod Doras pazudušo dzimšanas dienas torti, un visa ģimene sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti! Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz Mēnesnīcai atrast Mēnesspuķi, lai visi varētu priecāties Mēnessgaismas fiestā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu! Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons vada dārgumu medības, lai atrastu kapteiņa Zaļbārža laupījumu, bet vai viņi paliks draugi un dalīsies? Ikviens vēlas uzvarēt smilšu pils konkursā un baudīt īpašu saldējuma balvu, bet galvenais ir komandas darbs!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Brauni glābj tuklīšu mazuļus, kuri, tā vietā, lai veiktu pirmo lidojumu, apmaldās apmetnē Padingtons kopā ar Džonatanu un Džūdiju izbauda niršanas piedzīvojumu - bet kur ir Džūdijas kaklarota?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Toka skrienas ar laiku, lai redzētu pirmo pilno Saules aptumsumu savā mūžā. Padingtons saņem izgudrotāja balvu Simi vietā, kad viņa ir pārāk sakautrējusies, lai atzītos, bet kādēļ gan viņa pēc tam izjūt greizsirdību un skumjas?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauni dodas uz pludmali, lai pavadītu brīvdienas, un, ierodoties tur, satiek bākas uzraugu Šantiju. Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija apgūst glābēju praksi un ar glābēja Teilora palīdzību izglābj Brauna kungu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kas rada dīvainos trokšņus alā? Džonatans domā, ka tā ir nāriņa, bet Padingtons nav pārliecināts Džūdija vēlas atrast fosiliju pludmalē, pārējiem, šķiet, veicas, izņemot viņu, vai Padingtons spēs palīdzēt?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons uzzina, ka kaijas mīl frī kartupeļus un darīs visu, lai tos iegūtu, bet vai viņš spēs nogādāt pusdienas, kamēr tās ir karstas? Bākas gaisma ir sabojājusies, un ir miglaina nakts, vai Padingtons var palīdzēt izglābt kuģi jūrā?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Jaunais Fransuā pieredz Barbapapas dzimšanu.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When her parents wont let her have french fries for every meal, Hazel wishes for unlimited fries. But Cosmo and Wanda fail to mention that eating so many magical fries would turn her into a potato! For help Cosmo, Wanda, and Hazel pay a visit to Mother Nature, where Hazel accidentally eats the prized "mother potato." Can she reconcile her fry fixation and get back in Mother Natures good graces, or will Hazel have to face her wrath while stuck as a potato forever? // After Hazel and Marcus watch a scary movie Cosmo and Wanda lent them, paranormal incidents happen in the Wells home. Hazel wishes Marcus had a ghost tracking show to investigate. But Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda learn the ghost is Ghost Pepper, a fairy actress whose spirit was trapped in the video tape. Fearing her capture will reveal fairies existence, Hazel must convince Marcus to have an "exorcism" as a cover to send her back to Fairy World.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy is being chased by Gargamel. Lily and her dragon friend, Voltaire, come to his rescue. Scaredy feels bad about not being able to defend himself, so he also tries to befriend Voltaire. But without Lily as an interpreter, Voltaire ends up swallowing Scaredy Smurf whole! Lily, Papa Smurf and Willow do everything that they can to get him out of there, because its cold in the stomach of the ice breathing dragon... // Chef Smurf has burned the meal he was cooking but doesnt have any clean pans to start again. So, he uses one of Papa Smurfs old cauldrons, that he found abandoned in his laboratory. When Clumsy spills too many chilis in the cauldron, he manages to bring it back to life! The cauldron, once conscious, wants to get its revenge on Papa Smurf because it is upset about having been abandoned after many years of loyal services.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Its time for the Great Smurf Games in the village! The big prize? A magical sphere that grants all the members of the winning team one wish of their choice. Clumsy sees this as the perfect opportunity to become Agile Smurf, but no one wants to team up with him. Gargamel is also looking forward to the games because he wants to use the sphere to capture all the Smurfs! Hes well prepared and has set up traps all over the forest. The Great Games start with the traditional relay race. During the race, Storm and Grouchy are captured by Gargamel, who learns that only one Smurf who wins the Great Games will get a wish. So, he decides to send Dwayne and Rowena to take part in the Games, disguised as Storm and Grouchy. They go looking for the magical sphere, that has now been taken by Clumsy. They offer to team up with him, to his great surprise...

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.desc: After breaking up with Granny Tentacles, GrandPat is heartbroken. To get the old couple back together, Squidina turns The Patrick Show into a dating game, where GrandPat has to compete against Slappy and Larry for Grannys love. // Bikini Bottom is ravaged with an ice cream eating beast. The Ice Cream Man and Ice Cream King team up to capture this mysterious monster. Squidina tags along to film their mission, then is put in a compromising position when she learns that Patrick has been eating the citys ice cream all along.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max appears to have willingly switched to the villains side, prompting President Kickbutt to assign Captain Perfect as Phoebes new superhero partner. Max quickly gains the villains trust and leads Kiefer and the other henchmen to his house to fight Phoebe and Captain Perfect. During the fight, Max and Kiefer capture Phoebe and Captain Perfect. Max reveals he was never really evil, but was only pretending to gain access to the Chip-Chucker. Max and Phoebe defeat Kiefer and the henchmen, and they discover that the Chip-Chucker contains technology that leads them to the identitly of the Mastermind, who is revealed to be Lazlo Chance, B.C.s father. Chloe is anxious about going to the dance with B.C. and keeps trying to avoid him whenever a slow song comes on. Seeking help from Phoebe, she hides in the photo booth to teleport home. However, Jinx and Booch find a photo of her mid-teleport (they cannot see who did the teleporting), leading them to believe theres a superhero among them.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Lils favorite boba shop is closing! The kids try to save the cafe using pucker limes, but are quickly forced to save Canyon Valley from the pucker. // Lil and Min both realize how similar they are to their moms and set out to distinguish themselves.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Eager to become Master Criminals, Lil and Jack help Chuck with his "dirty laundry". But are they ready for a life of crime?

Together they must battle the dragon and find their way back to their fairies before Jorgen finds out! // When band and orchestra tryouts happen at school, Hazel finds herself stuck in the middle of a rivalry between the two. Rather than choose a side, she wishes to be good at all instruments and ends up in both. Exhausted from the double life shes living, she wishes that the band and orchestra had nothing to be rivals about. In granting the wish, Cosmo and Wanda get rid of all music on Earth. Hazel, with the help of the Nmusic Phairy (silent N), must restore music to Earth and end this rivalry once and for all!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: Wylde Pak

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Dev is bummed at his own birthday party because his dad is off working. Hazel tries to cheer him up by wishing for a pair of rocket boots for him. He is stoked! Then, a party princess arrives, but this is no ordinary party princess, its VICKY from the original series. Meanwhile, Cosmo, Wanda, and Peri stumble into a secret room, where they discover that Dale has been investigating Hazel since Founders Day. Back at the party, Vicky, rotten as ever, forces the kids to make crafts for her online store instead of having fun. Hazel comes up with a plan full of zany traps to stop Vicky and take the party back! When Dev discovers his dad has been researching Hazel instead of spending time with him, Dev lashes out at Hazel and wishes Peri away. Left alone with his anger, is there a devious plan hatching in Devs mind?

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe are clicking as a team, celebrating another big save, and impressing Captain Perfect with their work. However, they are unaware that the Masterminds henchman Keifer has implanted a chip in Maxs neck which makes him unwittingly commit crimes in Secret Shores. When President Kickbutt tells Phoebe and Captain Perfect what Max has been doing, she orders them to arrest him. Max escapes, and confronts Keifer about what she has been doing to him. Phoebe and Captain ultimately corner Max and remove the chip from his neck, but Max feels betrayed by his sister. Meanwhile, Chloe helps Jinx navigate a mess when he inadvertently invites both his mom and grandma to the dance as his dates.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe start the process to impress Captain Perfect and save their mission, but they clash over their different styles. As Max sees that Phoebe worked better with Captain Perfect, he decides that he will also be better off with a new partner, and summons his friend Gideon from Hiddenville. Gideon doesnt fit the superhero mold, however, so Max uses one of his gadgets to give him size and strength. But the setting is off, and Max shrinks Gideon to the size of an ant, forcing him to locate and save his impossible-to-see friend before Phoebe and Captain Perfect discover what hes done. Meanwhile, Chloe asks Booch and Jinx to try their best to bond with new crush BC, so they pretend to be wealthy like his family.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: After watching a detective TV show with her dad, Hazel wishes she could solve a mystery like a genuine gumshoe. At first, she is wrapped up in the thrill of solving a mystery, but things get real when the landlord goes missing. Everyone is a suspect - kids at school, the strange new neighbors, and even Cosmo and Wanda! Things intensify when Hazel suspects her family is the next target. In a dramatic climax at dinner at her neighbors, Hazel unveils the truth. Is it foul play? Or is it just her imagination?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Meteorite and her band are playing a concert to motivate the Smurfs who are picking blueberries, but their concert attracts Gargamel. This time, to outwit him, the Smurfs have a plan: they dance until hes exhausted and then run away from him. This tactic gives Gargamel an idea: to clone himself. He manages to create a Gargamel-karateka and a child-Gargamel, but they dont turn out to be as useful as hed hoped... They do capture Brainy Smurf but he doesnt let them get away with it. // Papa Smurf is constantly interrupted by the Smurfs asking for advice about all sorts of things, so he loses his patience and tells them hes not the Tree of Knowledge. The Smurfs believe the legend and go looking for the tree in the forest. Dimwitty goes off in a sulk because everyone always makes fun of his ideas, and he unexpectedly falls into a hollow tree trunk. When the Smurfs walk past it, they think theyve found the legendary tree so listen carefully to its advice.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf has always dreamed of observing a very special star that is only visible once every three thousand years. Unfortunately, Monkey breaks his telescope while playing with Baby Smurf, in a way that even Handy cant fix. Feeling very guilty, he goes off into the forest looking for a star for Papa Smurf. Baby Smurf is very upset about being separated from his good friend Monkey. So Papa Smurf promises to go looking for him the next day but the problem is no one knows where hes gone. // During a test run in the forest, Handy loses his jetpack. Its found and picked up by Dwayne who wants to make himself one in his size. Determined to get it back from Gargamel, Handy wants to put together a dream team with Hefty, Smurfette and Storm. But hell have to make do with Blossom, Bubble and Baby Smurf who are the only ones available to help him. So he sets off on his own to accomplish his mission and face Dwayne in the air.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse! // Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again. // After watching a detective TV show with her dad, Hazel wishes she could solve a mystery like a genuine gumshoe. At first, she is wrapped up in the thrill of solving a mystery, but things get real when the landlord goes missing. programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel and Jasmine have planned their very first sleepover but Dev Dimmadome threatens to throw an even better party! To draw her classmates attention Hazel boasts that she lives in a luxury hotel and wishes her apartment building into The Wellsington Hotelsington Hotel. Now she must balance running the hottest hotel in Dimmadelphia and spending time with Jasmine and Winn before they check out of the friendship! // Hoping to win a class superlative, Hazel wishes to be famous at her school. Father Time cuts her a deal for 1,500 minutes of fame, but Principal Krentz is not happy about Hazels celebrity status and threatens to transfer her if she doesnt stop being a "distraction" by the end of lunch. With tons of time left on her wish, Nick of Time arrives with a solution: if Hazel acts like a New Yorker, her remaining minutes will turn into New York Minutes and pass faster. Can Hazel act New Yorky enough to beat the clock?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed."

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf is returning from an expedition to find rare ingredients when one of them is accidentally eaten by one of Farmers snails. A few days later, Brainy is attacked by a creature that turns him into a zombie, and soon the whole village is contaminated. Lily and Farmer have to work together to find the monster and give it the antidote that will save the village! // Gargamel strikes a deal with Rowena: he will take her to see her favorite singer in concert and she will accept to be turned into the Smurfette so that he can trick his mother, who thinks hes completely useless. But as soon as she sees her, Granny is reminded of her childhood doll and falls under her spell. Meanwhile, in the forest, the real Smurfette is rehearsing a play with Dimwitty and Poet when both Smurfettes switch places by accident: Rowena is now acting in the play for Poet and Smurfette ends up at Gargamels hovel..

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: No one wants to look after Baby Smurf! So Brainy decides that Smurfette should do it, and shes determined to do a good job and to teach him smurf-fu. But then Grouchy gets involved, and he wants to prove that hes the best babysitter in the village! So war between the two candidates is declared. They have to compete in different challenges to decide which one of them is the best babysitter. // Blossom dreams of traveling to Mars, so Handy puts his ingenuity to the test to get her there. When Lily and Storm learn about this amazing project, they decide to help their friend, even though they will miss her when shes away. But they need to make sure that Brainy doesnt find out because Papa Smurf has forbidden all trips to Mars! Will Blossom manage to take off into space and leave all of her friends behind?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy invents an incredible machine that can translate what animals say. He wants to help solve their problems. But Clumsy breaks the machine and needs to make sure that his friends dont find out! So he swaps places with a bear and starts talking in its place. There are misunderstandings all over the place in the village and the Smurfs think that theyre actually talking to a real bear ... who really needs their help. // Dimwitty and Clumsy cause a huge accident when their fire truck collides with Papa Smurfs laboratory. Hes fed up with their nonsense and orders them to clean everything up. In doing so, and thinking that hes doing the right thing, Dimwitty empties some of the potions into the toilet, opening a portal with other worlds! Theyre going to have a hard time finding the way back with the toilet cubicle as a ship.

programme.desc: Max and the Midknights go to Fendras cottage to retrieve Sir Gadabouts stolen courage. Once inside the cottage, Millie makes a surprising discovery, but their search for Sir Gababouts courage is interrupted when Fendra returns home.

programme.title: Dora the Explorer

When she travels she always take with her a little back with survival equipment and a singing map.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger
programme.desc: Henry Hart is a normal eighth grade student, with an out of school job that takes him on amazing adventures. They go on bizarre and crazy travels, battling criminals and villains that try to attack his hometown and Captain Man himself. Meanwhile at home, Henry has to stay in hiding, keeping his sidekick job as a secret from his best friends, Charlotte and Jasper, and little sister Piper. programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob is desperate to have Squidward visit him at home, but Squidward says theres no reason for him to come over, especially when hes perfectly comfortable in his own home. // All of SpongeBobs square pants have shrunk in the dryer. When he goes to the store to buy some more, he finds that the store is all out of square pants! With no other choice, SpongeBob decides to try a new look - round pants!

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: An exhausted Timmy makes a wish for complete darkness so he can get some sleep. But he doesnt count on Cosmo and Wanda turning into Scary Fairies in the dark, and now, in a manic episode set in the pitch black of night, Timmys on the run from all the crazy things that go bump in the night! // Dad shipwrecks the Turners on a desert island and has to save the family before the island is blown up by a secret government bomb.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: Dad changes Timmys room into a surveillance center to prove that his kindly neighbor, Dinkleberg, is truly evil. Being the best neighbor ever, Dinkleberg pretends to be evil just to make Dad feel better. // Foop is back! This time, hes seeking to be the most popular kid at magic school. His plan? Running for class president. His opponent? Poof! But if Foop cant win over his classmates, hell just as easily destroy them!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: As one of Aangs little detours, the group heads toward the island of Kyoshi. But soon they learn that the townspeople dont trust foreigners at all; however, when Aang proves to them that he is the Avatar they are treated as guests of honor. Katara wants to get some supplies and leave as soon as possible, while Aang is enjoying his time as a celebrity. Little do they know, though, that the Fire Nation has tracked them down. Also, Sokka meets and trains with a female warrior named Suki. Will Aang be able to save the village from the wrath of the Fire Nation?

programme.desc: Robby invites Izzy to a drive-in movie, so all the Maltos tag along and go to extreme lengths to make it the best night ever. Who wouldnt want their entire family joining their first date? Robby, thats who. The Maltos well-intentioned antics charm Izzy and embarrass Robby, but the show must go on - and it does, taking an unexpected twist when the science fiction in the film becomes science reality...

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Frankie bottles up their feelings after not making the fearleading team and causes unintended electrical outbursts. After misguided efforts, Clawd learns that being a good, older brother means more than just protecting his sister.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester have to find a smart way to make their flight despite not looking like their passport photos. // Best decides to let his sister win "Employee of the Month" for once, but finds that losing doesnt come naturally.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: When Rocky swallows the last piece of their jigsaw puzzle, Best and Bester head into the unknown to retrieve it. // Best and Bester go on a mission to return an overdue library book without being spotted by the scary librarian.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester gate-crash the set of their favorite soap opera in order to find out what happens next. // Bester sets out to prove to a cynical Best that the new "Beast of Bettervale" movie is based on a true story.

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League
programme.desc: Annabelle saves Easter from an evil villain with a chocolate-chip on his shoulder. // When Bex zaps her new alarm clock, it turns into a roving rooster of doom, threatening to destroy the city!

programme.title: Planet Sheen
programme.desc: Sheen for a Day:It is Princess Ooms "Popping Out Day" and the Emperor has completely forgotten. While The Emperor scrambles to find Princess Oom the perfect present, Sheen has decided he too wants a day in his honor. In an effort to impress The Emperor and get his day, Sheen gives the Emperor the perfect gift for Princess Oom, the most important part of the rocket ship he and Mr. Nesmith are building. Now Sheen and Mr. Nesmith need to come up with a plan to get the piece of the rocket ship back before Princess Oom gets too attached to it and ruins the rocket ship completely. Well Bread Man:Once a year, Zeenuian adults leap off cliffs in loaves of bread and float down safely to the ground to commemorate one of Zeenus greatest and grand traditions. When The Emperor finds out that Sheen is just a boy, he refuses to let him participate in one of the most sacred holidays in Zeenu as its only for adults. The Emperor determines that the only way for Sheen to take part in the tradition is to take the "Manhood Trial by Fire." Seeing an opportunity to destroy Sheen, Dorkus volunteers to train him for the "Manhood Trial by Fire" with the intention of sabotaging him.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Canadian computer-animated television series Top Wing presents an exciting story of four courageous young birds, Swift, Penny, Brody, and Rod on Big Swirl Island. They are cadets at Top Wing Academy with the best of the best students and have access to the most advanced technology. By operating different vehicles like a submarine, a boat, a jet or a motorcycle, the cadets learn how to work as a team and are the first to rush to the rescue to those in trouble. Major lessons are learnt with the help of their mentor Speedy. With every new task performed the cadets become braver, stronger and smarter.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Antics on Ice: Privates in heaven - icy, freezing heaven. The Lunacorns on Ice extravaganza is in town, and Skippers determined to take him as a treat. Accompanied by unexpected fellow fanboys Bing and Roy, the gang heads to the arena. Things get a bit d-icey when the gorilla and rhino end up on the ice with the lunacorns. The enraged director is ready to shutter the whole thing unless they find some way to slip n slide out of it. Showdown on Fairway 18:A legendary putter is at the center of controversy when the Amarillo Kid returns to the zoo. The slippery armadillo needs Privates help to make good on an ill-advised bet with two gopher brothers. Whos the bad guy here though? The gophers show up at the zoo to actually warn the penguins about the kid! The story takes us on more twists and turns than a Pebble Beach golf hole!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: King Me/Private and the Winky Factory King Me: King Juliens archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. This time the sneaky lemur has a document that "proves" King Julien is not the legitimate king because he wasnt born in Madagascar. A series of challenges to prove whos more kingly ensues, and the penguins try to stack the deck in Juliens favor by each switching brains with him. Simple, right? How could a plan like this possibly fail? Private and the Winky Factory: Privates favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur. Distraught that the snack cake is ceasing production, Private urges a raid on the Winky Factory where the last remaining Winkies are rolling off the production line. Impressed by Privates passion, Skipper gives him command of the mission! The young penguin learns theres a heck of a lot to digest when leading a team. programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: In The Void, Shadow intercepts Sonics latest Shatterspace transverse, for a personal face-to-fist encounter. Sonic assumes this Shadow is another distorted prism version of someone he knows until Shadow calls Sonic by name.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Best Laid Plaintains: Its a special day when Bada and Bing get a shipment of delicious plantains to eat. Although they jealously guard the African bananas, King Juliens determined to taste them too. He sneaks into the gorilla habitat while they sleep, and he and Marlene end up eating a few too many for the gorillas not to notice. Like all of them. When they realize what theyve done they head for the hills as fast as their stolen car can take them. Can the penguins calm the savage beasts before they bash the banana bandits? P.E.L.T.: Skippers losing it. His performance on the obstacle course is actually slowing down, so he has to trigger a special fitness test to prove he can still lead the squad. Kowalski takes over as Skipper excuses himself to go on his fitness quest. The brainy bird appears to do a bang-up job in the leadership role - are Skippers days at the helm over but hes too chicken to admit it?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: The series Bubble Guppies revolves around the underwater adventures of a group of mermaid-like preschoolers who life in the fictional underwater city of Bubbletucky. The episode starts with a sketch of Molly saying "Hi, its me Molly and its time for-" only to be stopped by Gil doing the subject of the show. When Gil or Molly says "Its time for Bubble Guppies!", the theme song starts. After the theme song, the Little Fish say the episodes name. Something happens when a character goes to school. After that, the school day begins and the Bubble Guppies say "Good morning, Mr. Grouper!". Later, the remaining Guppie tells Mr. Grouper about what happened earlier. He states "Lets think about it," and the characters discuss the topic. The pop song for the episode then begins.One of the Guppies will go to a shop that mostly focuses on the topic. The owner of the shop will asks questions about what he or she needs. Later, Mr. Grouper comes into the shop and says its time for lunch, and the "Lunchtime" song plays. At lunch the characters make a food joke about the subject of the episode. After lunch, another Gil and Molly sketch is shown. The Guppies do something fun which leads Mr. Grouper talking more about the topic, which leads into a dancing song. Mr. Grouper then says its time to go outside, the "Outside" song plays, and the Guppies make up a story about the topic. After this, Gil and Molly do another sketch.The Guppies go on a field trip that focuses on the topic, and the show concludes with the last Gil and Molly sketch and a shorter version of the theme song.

programme.title: Breadwinners
programme.desc: Two ducks with thin legs and round faces, SwaySway and Buhdeuce, are best friends. They fly around the water-based planet Pondgea in a rocket-powered van and deliver fresh bread to its citizens. They often find themselves in awkward and funny situations, and sometimes their workdays are quite dangerous. They find new friends, deal with opponents and have fun, making sure Pondgea always receive fresh bread on time.

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: СуперЖена
programme.desc: Беспрецедентный баттл за титул суперженщины начинается! Каждую неделю 4 обаятельные и привлекательные девушки будут выяснять, кто же из них достоин звания лучшей жены. С понедельника по четверг дамы будут приходить друг к другу в гости, чтобы оценить хозяйственность, саморазвитие и сексуальность конкуренток. Сжульничать и выставить желаемое за действительное им не удастся, ведь за ними будет наблюдать опытный психолог. В пятницу он проведет беседы тет-а-тет и соберет девушек вместе, чтобы расставить все точки над "i".Хитрые манипуляторши, ведические жены, роковые соблазнительницы, яжматери и боевые подруги… Каждая женщина убеждена, что именно ее модель поведения самая правильная. Но кто же из них может покорить не только сердце своего мужчины, но и впечатлить конкуренток?

programme.title: Female Gaze
programme.desc: Cet episode suit lartiste Gabriela Alatorre, entre le Mexique, Londres et Berlin, dans sa quete pour "habiter limage". Realisatrice et photographe, elle explore lautorepresentation feminine comme un territoire de resistance et de reinvention. Son travail brouille les frontières entre intime et collectif : en se photographiant, en photographiant dautres femmes, en leur apprenant à se photographier à travers des ateliers, elle construit un espace où les regards et les corps se croisent, se confrontent et se libèrent. À travers son parcours, le film interroge ce que signifie reprendre possession de son corps et de son image, se representer soi-meme sans mediation, et creer des histoires qui appartiennent enfin aux femmes elles-memes.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Veselības kompass
programme.desc: Raidījums stāstīs par dažādiem ar veselību saistītiem jautājumiem, sniegs padomus un vedīs tevi ceļā uz veselīgāku dzīvesveidu, labāku pašsajūtu un priecīgāku ikdienu! Katru nedēļu uz sarunu aicināsim dažādus jomas ekspertus un kopā gan sportosim, gan apspriedīsim dažādas ar veselību saistītas tēmas, gan arī izmēģināsim daudz kā jauna un mūsu veselībai noderīga!

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Māris Olte dosies ciemos pie meža saimnieces, kuras zināšanas un darba spējas liek uzmirdzēt meža skaistumam. Raidījums "Meža Veča Emuāri" ciemos pie Lienes, kura atklās ar kādiem izaicinājumiem un risinājumiem darba procesā saskārusies un rezultāts reiz ticis novērtēts ar augstāko atzinību meža nozarē - "Zelta čiekurs".

programme.title: Kursu kari
programme.desc: Rīgas Mākslas un mediju tehnikuma skolēnu veidota erudīcijas un jautrības spēles "Kursu Kari".

programme.title: Reģionālās Televīzijas piedāvā
programme.desc: 02:15 Jēkabpils laiks (Vidusdaugavas TV); 02:30 Skats no Ventspils (Kurzemes TV); 02:45 Vidzemē (Vidzemes TV); 03:00 Runā Latgale (LRT).

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Māksla dzīvot
programme.desc: Šonedēļ raidījumā "Māksla dzīvot" tiksimies ar neiroloģi un algoloģi - sāpju ārsti Lindu Zvauni. Skaidrosim, kā atklāt migrēnu, ko darīt ar nepārtrauktām galvassāpēm, un ko ar šo visu iesākt? Rubrikā par zobu veselību, uzzināsim kā uzlabot smaidu ar estētisko zobārstniecību un cik maģiski var uzburt jaunu smaidu, bet acu veselības sadaļā skaidrosim, cik svarīgi laicīgi pamanīt, ka bērns neredz, kā iedrošināt bērnu nebaidīties no brillēm. Bet dejotāja un horegrāfe, deju studijas "Vibe" vadītāja Elza Kronberga dalīsies stāstā kā Jaunzēlande izmainīja viņas dzīvi, kā Elza kļuva par dejotāju un cik ļoti iedvesmojoša dzīve bija Jaunzēlandē. Bet kāpēc Elza atgiezās mājās no zaļās salas, uzzināsiet jaudīgā dvēseles sarunā, kur neizpaliks visgaršīgākās pusdienas Latvijā!

programme.title: Copes lietas
programme.desc: Divu azartisku makšķernieku piedzīvojumi Latvijas un citu zemju ūdeņos. Iepazīsimies ar visiem makšķerēšanas veidiem - no pludiņa līdz pat mušai, ieskatoties gan pašā makšķerēšanas procesā, gan arī katra makšķerēšanas stila inventāra apguvē.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Pirms vairāk nekā 70 gadiem Japānā radītā mūzikas izglītības sistēma "Yamaha" ir populāra visā pasaulē, piedāvājot unikālu mācību metodi muzikālajai attīstībai visa mūža garumā. Latvijā viena no lielākajām "Yamaha" mūzikas skolām darbojas Valmierā un Cēsīs, apvienojot vairākus simtus audzēkņu - gan pavisam mazi bērniņi, gan cilvēki, kas mūzikas instrumentu apguvi sākuši, sasniedzot pensijas vecumu. Skolu aktīvi un aizrautīgi vada Jānis un Anta Ozoliņi. Abi ir arī kuplas ģimenes vecāki, un smejot saka - "Mūsu piektais bērns ir "Yamaha"".

programme.title: Āzija
programme.desc: Saskaņā ar oficiālajiem datiem, janvāra protestu laikā Kazahstānā gāja bojā aptuveni 225 cilvēki, vairāk nekā 4000 tika ievainoti un aptuveni tikpat cilvēku tika aizturēti. Tas, kas notika Kazahstānā un kas tagad notiks ar protestētājiem, ir svarīgākais jautājums, uz kuru mēs centīsimies rast atbildi šajā sērijā.

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: ReTV raidījums "Meža Veča Emuāri" kopā ar Māri Olti atgriežas ekrānos, lai 9 raidījumos izzinātu aktuālas tēmas, kas skar ik vienu dabas cienītāju un viesi. Satiksim dažādus cilvēkus, kuri dalīsies savās zināšanās un prasmēs kā viņi rūpējas par vidi kurā dzīvo, domājot par tās izaugsmi vai varenību!

programme.title: Oranžās Indijas Brīvdienas
programme.desc: Otrajā sērijā "Oranžās Brīvdienas" nonāk līdz īpaši nozīmīgam brīdim - pirmajam koncertam Indijā. Pirms tā grupa aizvada vēl vienu mēģinājumu, uz kuru ierodas indiešu dziedātāju Samāra, kas piekritusi nodziedāt vienu dziesmu kopā ar grupu. Kad viss izmēģināts un niansēs pārunātas, klāt pirmais koncerts Goa! Skatītāji dejo, dzied līdzi un filmē katru mirkli, bet latviešu klātbūtne padarīja šo vakaru vēl emocionālāku. Grupas mūzika pierādīja, ka tā spēj aizraut un vienot cilvēkus arī pavisam citā pasaules malā, un šis koncerts kļuva par spilgtu startu Indijas un Nepālas koncerttūrei.

programme.title: Tā dzīvojam
programme.desc: Šitake sēņu audzētājs Imants Urpens (2019.gada arhīvs)

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Mēs darām tā
programme.desc: Katrs no videostāstiem seko līdzi galveno varoņu dienas gaitām, īpašu vērību pievēršot viņu iestrādātajai zaļā dzīvesstila rutīnai, kas saistīta gan ar saimniekošanu mājās, darbā un dārzā, atkritumu šķirošanu, enerģijas avotu un transporta izvēli, ēšanas paradumiem, darba pienākumu organizēšanu un atpūtu. Tie ļauj ielūkoties, piemēram, šobrīd Rīgā lielākās apkaimes biedrības pārstāvju ikdienā, kuri Grīziņkalnā rūpējas par zaļas un labiekārtotas ārtelpas izveidi, kā arī Pierīgas novadu mājsaimniecībās, vērtējot dažādu apkures veidu efektivitāti un draudzīgumu videi, dažādu mākslinieku saimniekošanas paradumos u.c. Raidījumu vada aktrise un kostīmu māksliniece Madara Botmane, iepazīstinot ar planētai draudzīga dzīvesstila ikdienas paradumiem Latvijas kopienās, komūnās, kolektīvos, apkaimēs un vairāku paaudžu ģimeņu mājvietās.

programme.title: Reģionālās Televīzijas piedāvā
programme.desc: 09:15 Jēkabpils laiks (Vidusdaugavas TV); 09:30 Skats no Ventspils (Kurzemes TV); 09:45 Vidzemē (Vidzemes TV); 10:00 Runā Latgale (LRT).

programme.title: Mēs varam - mēs darām!
programme.desc: Televeikala skatlogs. Iedvesmojies kā hobiju pārvērst par pelnītspējīgu biznesu. Uzzini, kas tuvākā un tālākā apkārtnē atjaunots, uzlabots un pilveidots. Seko līdz, stāstiem ar kuriem varam lepoties un iespējām, kas var būt aktuālas tieši Tev!

programme.title: Brīvdienas sākas tagad!
programme.desc: Vai brīvdienas vienmēr izvēršas kā plānotas? Nē, reizēm sanāk pat labāk! Šoreiz Keita ar Nikiju viesojas Ogres novadā un uzzina, ka pilsēta gatavojas ikvasaras lielajam notikumam - pilsētas svētkiem. Meitenēm rodas ķecerīga doma tos sākt izbaudīt jau tagad. Kā viņām tas izdosies? Vēsture, leģendas, sportiskas aktivitātes, garšas, un skatuves māksla - izklausās neticami, bet to visu iespējams izbaudīt vienā nedēļas nogalē.

programme.title: Cēsu novads - izcila vieta dzīvei!
programme.desc: Sezonas noslēgumā raidījuma vadītāja Keita Loreta Kronberga izzinās Cēsu novada nākotnes attīstības plānus, sarunājoties ar novada domes priekšsēdētāju Jāni Rozenbergu un viesojosties Cēsu alus darītavā.

programme.title: Zinātne tuvplānā
programme.desc: Tas, vai sasniedzam mērķus un ieceres, lielā mērā ir atkarīgs no tā, cik labi vadām dažādus procesus, tostarp savstarpējo un arī uzņēmumu saziņu. Zinātne tuvplānā 4. sezonas 2. epizodē uzmanības lokā būs pētījumi komunikācijas un vadības jomā. Raidījumā viesosies pārmaiņu un iekšējās komunikācijas stratēģe, Vidzemes Augstskolas lektore Ieva Zaumane un "Visma Latvija" vadītāja Antra Zālīte. Raidījuma viešņas meklēs atbildes uz jautājumiem: Kāpēc un kam iekšējā komunikācija ir svarīga? Kāpēc nepietiek tikai ar ārējo komunikāciju? Kā nošķirt baumas un klačas no kvalitatīvas komunikācijas? Kā mainās iekšējās komunikācijas forma un mērķi, mainoties darba videi un iespējām strādāt attālināti? Un kā tad izmērīt, cik efektīva ir iekšējā komunikācija? "Zinātne tuvplānā" ir sarunu raidījums par sabiedrībā aktuāliem pētījumiem un tematiem. Deviņu raidījumu ciklu, ko piedāvā Vidzemes Augstskola, vada žurnāliste Sandra Kropa-Kaļužnaja.

programme.title: Ceļot bez robežām
programme.desc: Ceļot bez robežām komanda saulaino un eksotisko Šrilanku ir nomainījusi pret ziemīgo Lapzemi, Somijas reģionu Levi, kas atrodās aiz polārā loka. Sniegs, slēpošana, ziemeļblāzma, zirgi, ziemeļbrieži, somu saunas un daudz kas cits sagaida 4 sēriju ciklā par Lapzemi.

programme.title: Latgale kara ēnā
programme.desc: Uzņēmuma "LatStab" īpašnieks Staņislavs Ratinskis raidījumam "Latgale kara ēnā" atklāj savu skaudro bērnības stāstu, kas motivē viņu ne tikai neapstāties pie sasniegtā, bet arī sniegt palīdzību ukraiņiem un nesūkstīties par nepieciešamību meklēt jaunus izejmateriālu piegādātājus Krievijai piemēroto sankciju dēļ.

programme.title: Piedzīvojums dabā
programme.desc: Piedzīvojumu meklētājs Jānis Kļaviņš dodas jaunajā un vēl nezināmajā, izpētot dabu pārgājienos.

programme.title: ReTV Ziņas
programme.desc: Informācijas līderis reģionos - ReTV. Jaunākās ziņas katru darbdienu 15.00, 19.00 un 21.00.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Atbalsta centrs Pērle piedāvā cilvēkiem ar invaliditāti, kuriem ir garīga rakstura traucējumi, apmeklēt dienas aprūpes centru un specializētās darbnīcas. Šeit cilvēki saturīgi pavada laiku dažādās nodarbībās, tiekas ar draugiem, svin svētkus un dodas izzinošās ekskursijās. Pērlē ikviens darbojas ar mērķi uzturēt un stiprināt esošās prasmes un attīstīt jaunas prasmes, kas palīdz kļūt patstāvīgākiem gan pašaprūpē, gan dzīvojot sabiedrībā. Trīs gadu laikā Pērle ir kļuvusi par drošu vietu, kur cilvēki var saņemt atbalstu, satikties un būt noderīgi.

programme.title: Tā dzīvojam
programme.desc: Edvīns Šakalis, kalējs no Rūjienas (2019.gada arhīvs)

programme.title: Skats no Ventspils. Notikumi. Cilvēki. Viedokļi
programme.desc: Raidījums par notikumiem Ventspilī.

programme.title: Ceļot bez robežām
programme.desc: Ceļot bez robežām komanda saulaino un eksotisko Šrilanku ir nomainījusi pret ziemīgo Lapzemi, Somijas reģionu Levi, kas atrodās aiz polārā loka. Sniegs, slēpošana, ziemeļblāzma, zirgi, ziemeļbrieži, somu saunas un daudz kas cits sagaida 4 sēriju ciklā par Lapzemi.

programme.title: Līdakas un Leģendas
programme.desc: Brāļi Klēģeri apvieno spēkus ar Kurzemes puses mutīgo un kolorīto copmani un bitenieku Alex Crazy Fisherman, meklējot Ciecernieka mammas, bet brangākais pārsteigums viņus sagaida vienā no lielākajām Kurzemes upēm - Ventā!

programme.title: Mans RIFS
programme.desc: Šajā epizodē viesojas ģitārists Aigars Aress Māls. Viņa muzikālais ceļš sākas ģimenes vidē, kur tēvs, vectēvs un vecmāte visi bija saistīti ar mūziku. Visspligtākā atmiņa Aigaram ir palikusi, kad tēvs pirms gulētiešanas spēlēja Iron Maiden rifus- skaņas, kas kļuva par neatņemamu bērnības sastāvdaļu un pavēra turpmāku ceļu mūzikai.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Vieta, kur rodama viena no Latvijas lielākajām akmeņu kolekcijām, "Spoku namiņš", kurā var sastapties ar dažādiem dabas veidojumiem, un senlietu kolekcija, kas atgādina, ka bez pagātnes nav nākotnes. Tās ir Lubānas puses saimnieka Vilņa Strautiņa mājas "Vaidavas", kurās bijušais 6.Saeimas deputāts iekārtojis arī unikālu, vairāk nekā 3000 krūzīšu kolekciju. Turpat līdzās - pašam savs parlaments ar simts deputātiem, taču pati lielākā vērtība ir pats "Vaidavu" saimnieks - allaž pozitīvs, darbīgs, zinošs un tālredzīgs.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Šovasar savu 30. dzimšanas dienu atzīmēja Jūrmalas Neredzīgo biedrība - organizācija, kas šo gadu gaitā ir pavērusi jaunas iespējas ļoti daudziem cilvēkiem, kas daļēji vai pavisam ir zaudējuši redzi. Biedrības vadītāja Iveta Vilka atzīst - vislielākais gandarījums ir, ja izdodas palīdzēt cilvēkiem atgūt pašapziņu, atkal noticēt saviem spēkiem, un, pats galvenais, justies pilnvērtīgiem sabiedrības locekļiem. Šogad necerētu popularitāti guvusi biedrības izveidotā koncertprogramma "Gaiss skan, zeme rīb" ar dziesmām, dejām, pat valsi, ko dejo divi neredzīgi cilvēki. Biedrības darbs ir cieši saistīts ar rehabilitāciju, ko nodrošina Latvijas Neredzīgo biedrība, mācot prasmes, kas nepieciešamas patstāvīgai dzīvei.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Riga TechGirls ir pirmā kopiena Latvijā, kas veltīta meiteņu un sieviešu izglītošanai un iedvesmošanai tehnoloģiju jomā. Tiek veidotas darbnīcas, kurās tiek mācīti datorprogrammēšanas pamati un citas informācijas laikmetā nepieciešamās vērtīgas prasmes. Regulāri notiek tikšanās ar iedvesmojošām sievietēm no IT, kurās viņas dalās ar savu veiksmes stāstu un runā par nozari. Šobrīd Riga TechGirls arī sadarbojas ar citām valstīm un iedvesmo cilvēkus visā pasaulē.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Volfu ģimene par savu miera un laimes meku izvēlējusies Sabili. Kristīne, būdama juriste, no likumiem nonākusi līdz plastilīnam un tā ražošanai. Viņa izveidojusi plastilīna zīmolu "Mīci". Bet Kristīnes vīrs senus pulksteņus, kas vairs nevar pildīt savu īsto funkciju, pārvērš elegantās rotās un aksesuāros.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Jelgavniecei Elīnai Apsītei ir savs īpašs stāsts, kas izmainīja viņas dzīvi un kuru viņa turpina stāstīt, šovasar Cēsu muzejā izveidojot izstādi par Jetti Užāni, jeb, kā viņu dēvēja tautā - Cimdu Jettiņu. Jette bija daiļamatmeistare, neskaitāmu rakstaino cimdu autore, domātāja un stāstniece, kaut arī visu mūžu pavadījusi invalīda ratiņos, viņa iedvesmoja ar lielu gara spēku, labestību un gaišu skatījumu uz dzīvi. Šo gara spēku, pasaules redzējumu, pavadot pie Cimdu Jettiņas vasaras brīvlaikus, jau kopš bērnības smēlusies arī Elīna Apsīte, un šoruden Cēsu muzejā viņa vēra durvis "Jettes skolai", kuras moto - "Mācīties būt laimīgākiem".

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Kristīne Vilcāne 2016.gadā kādā seminārā Anglijā no skatuves dzirdot apgalvojumu, ka ikviens var sarakstīt grāmatu un noskriet 10 kilomentrus - meta sev izaicinājumu un saprata, ka viss, ko viņa patiesi vēlas, ir iespējams. Viņa sajutu izteiktu vēlmi iedvesmot un iedrošināt tieši jauniešus, jo viņi savu dzīvi vēl tikai veido. Tagad viņa ir autore vairākām pasaku grāmatām un spēļu metodēm, kas palīdz bērniem un pieaugušajiem noticēt mūsdienu vērtībām, iespējām un izaugsmes domāšanai. Viņa ar domu biedriem izveidojusi piedzīvojumu terapijas kustību "Adventure Therapy Latvia" un veidojusi labbūtības programmas ar dažādām pieejām. Šobrīd kā brīvprātīgā darbojas biedrībā "MOT Latvija" un ir piedalījusies projektos, kuros sniedz atbalstu jauniešiem grūtā situācijā. Kristīne Vilcāne vēl paspējusi iesaistīties sporta klubā "Ašais", kas ir mazs, bet varen jaudīgs sporta klubs Cēsu pusē Drabešos un kopā ar kluba vadītāju atjaunojuši kādu senu sapni "Skrējiens apkārt Cēsīm".
